channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 02:52 Air alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community to Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 02:52 Air alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community to Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 02:36 Fragrant anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Novomoskovskiy district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Kryvyi R. Kryvyi R. Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 02:36 Fragrant anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Novomoskovskiy district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Kryvyi R. Kryvyi R. Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
